title: Human Name Datatype Schema
description: A name of a human with text, parts and usage information

given.description: Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names. This repeating element order: Given Names appear in the correct order for presenting the name

period.description: Time period when name was/is in use

prefix.description: Parts that come before the name. This repeating element order: Prefixes appear in the correct order for presenting the name

suffix.description: Parts that come after the name. This repeating element order: Suffixes appear in the correct order for presenting the name

text.description: Text representation of the full name

use.description: The use of a human name
